body.name: Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes (Regular Head) Periodontist Design Tapered Bristles for Sensitive Teeth and Receding Gums, Individually Wrapped Plaque Remover Travel Toothbrush (10 Pack, Colors Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 45 mins
features: EXTRA SOFT BRISTLES – The Nimbus Toothbrush uses Microfine Technology which utilizes two-levels of bristles to create unique softness and stability. The long single-end tapered fine bristles reach into areas not accessible to conventional bristles while the short end-rounded bristles are used to support and optimize plaque removal.

DURABLE – Nimbus bristles absorb less water which allows the brush to maintain its shape longer than standard Nylon bristles. Additionally, the bristles resist breakdown brought on from chemicals and natural mouth fluids which allows you to use Nimbus longer than average toothbrushes.

INVENTED BY PERIODONTIST – These toothbrushes were designed to create the safest brushing experience for teeth and gums while simultaneously providing highly efficient plaque removal on tooth surfaces. It has proven to be the best toothbrush for those with ultra-sensitive gums and teeth.

TESTED BY DENTIST – The Nimbus Microfine Technology has been evaluated by dental professionals. The consensus from testing the Nimbus brushes is this is the best brush you will ever use. The results speak for themselves.

10-PACK REGULAR SIZE – The Regular Nimbus utilizes a standard size brush head which is ideal to be used as an adult's everyday brush. This value pack comes equipped with 10 brushes, enough for each family member! Those who travel often can even set a few aside as designated travel brushes. The colors included in the pack may vary.
body.description: LOVE YOUR SMILE It's like a massage for your gums Hard bristles along with not properly cleaning your teeth can cause more harm than good, making your gums even more sensitive and damaged. Our pliable and ultra soft bristles are great for gums that are sensitive or inflamed. The long soft bristles are able to gently get into hard-to-reach crevices and gaps to remove the plaque build up. This is ideal for people with crowns, caps, implants, or gum recession that need an extra soft bristle to clean those sensitive areas. The Nimbus extra soft toothbrush is tender thanks to it's extra thin PBT fibers It effectively cleans the teeth and gums with it's 2 tiered design of densely arranged fibers You'll have access to all areas of the mouth due to our offers of different head sizes The square handle allows for the ideal 45 degree angle of cleaning

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Nimbus Microfine Toothbrush is designed to be an efficient plaque remover without damaging your gums. The long extra soft tapered bristles are great for reaching hard-to-reach places, while the stiffer but soft shorter bristles help support effective plaque removal. Periodontists, dentists that specialize in gum health, recommend using toothbrushes with super soft bristles to protect your gums and prevent further harm and damage from occurring. Furthermore, if you're using a soft bristled brush, you will not avoid brushing along the gums. The gum line is where the most plaque accumulates, so it's important to find a brush that is gentle in cleaning this sensitive area. The gentle massaging also means you are stimulating your gums leading to better circulation which is beneficial for the entire tooth support system.

The Nimbus Microfine Toothbrush is designed to be an efficient plaque remover without damaging your gums. The long extra soft tapered bristles are great for reaching hard-to-reach places, while the stiffer but soft shorter bristles help support effective plaque removal. Periodontists, dentists that specialize in gum health, recommend using toothbrushes with super soft bristles to protect your gums and prevent further harm and damage from occurring. Furthermore, if you're using a soft bristled brush, you will not avoid brushing along the gums. The gum line is where the most plaque accumulates, so it's important to find a brush that is gentle in cleaning this sensitive area. The gentle massaging also means you are stimulating your gums leading to better circulation which is beneficial for the entire tooth support system.

Why Nimbus Toothbrushes? Nimbus was developed by Periodontist Dr. Stanley Klein. He specially designed and manufactures the bristles specifically for the Nimbus toothbrush so that you can take brushing your teeth to the next level. Periodontist Designed Family Friendly Microfine Technology Refreshing Feel LOVE YOUR SMILE It's like a massage for your gums Hard bristles along with not properly cleaning your teeth can cause more harm than good, making your gums even more sensitive and damaged. Our pliable and ultra soft bristles are great for gums that are sensitive or inflamed. The long soft bristles are able to gently get into hard-to-reach crevices and gaps to remove the plaque build up. This is ideal for people with crowns, caps, implants, or gum recession that need an extra soft bristle to clean those sensitive areas. The Nimbus extra soft toothbrush is tender thanks to it's extra thin PBT fibers It effectively cleans the teeth and gums with it's 2 tiered design of densely arranged fibers You'll have access to all areas of the mouth due to our offers of different head sizes The square handle allows for the ideal 45 degree angle of cleaning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best tooth brush on earth.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been ordering this brand toothbrush for about 8 years. They are different from any others. The bristles are “sharp” but in a good way— they are VERY effective at cleaning your teeth down to the gums and beneath. My teeth always feel slippery and clean after use.The first time you use a Nimbus, go easy on the gums or you’ll have sore gums for a day. Ease in. Your gums will toughen up.When bristles begin to arch outwards, toss and get a new one. Usually one lasts about 3-4 months. No need to brush hard.The Nimbus was the brush my dentist gave out to patients years ago. No longer with the dentist but I will ALWAYS be with this brand toothbrush.Brush by just moving the head in tiny circles with bristles against the gums, angled toward the base of your teeth. That does the best job.Hardly have to floss after! Using this toothbrush. (But I do.)Such a fantastic toothbrush!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I learned of these toothbrushes from my dentist. They are the best! Quite easy on the gums and clean very well. My visits have been good since using these toothbrushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the best toothbrushes. We’ve bought them for years. Nice and soft yet sturdy. They are the ones my dental surgeon recommended to me after I had gum recession surgery. I give them to every member of my family, hoping their gums will be treated well, better than mine were with other types of brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softest toothbrushes ever!
reviews.reviewText: These are the softest toothbrushes ever! My husband has sensitive gums and these toothbrushes have been so nice for him! Definitely worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Soft but do a good job to clean up the teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the best toothbrushes. We make these stocking stuffers every Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrush for receding gums
reviews.reviewText: Came recommend by my periodontist, and it’s been the only toothbrush I’ve been using for years. Soft thins bristle get in between gum and tooth without harshness. Only toothbrush I recommend if you have gum issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order of 10 shorted
reviews.reviewText: These toothbrushes are wonderfully gentle for periodontal disease. However, I chose to order the 10 pack instead of 5 and stock up because the price was better and only 8 were received.
